definition: to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
to receive hospital treatment/to be hospitalized

pinyin: wan2 xing2 xin1 li3 zhi4 liao2
ji3 zhui1 zhi3 ya1 zhi4 liao2 shi1
ji3 zhui1 zhi3 ya1 zhi4 liao2 yi1 sheng1

definition: hyperbaric medicine/hyperbaric oxygen therapy (HBOT)/also 高壓氧療法|高压氧疗法[gao1 ya1 yang3 liao2 fa3]

sentences.english: A valuable road map for understanding and healing cybersex addictions.
sentences.chinese: 一个网络性爱的理解和治疗吸毒成瘾宝贵的路线图。

sentences.english: Conclusion Complex treatment is the most effective method for treatment of residual brun wound.
sentences.chinese: 结论综合治疗是治疗烧伤残余创面的重要方法。

sentences.english: Conclusion Complex treatment is the most effective method for treatment of residual brun wound.
sentences.chinese: 结论综合治疗是治疗烧伤残余创面的重要方法。

sentences.english: Investigations led to the diagnosis and treatment of subclavian artery stenosis.
sentences.chinese: 检查明确锁骨下动脉狭窄的诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: Will insulin analogs improve my diabetes treatment plan?
sentences.chinese: 胰岛素类似物会改善我的糖尿病治疗计划吗？

sentences.english: Objective To explore the diagnosis and treatment features of pulmonary heart disease caused by tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肺结核所致肺心病的诊断和治疗特点。

sentences.english: Objective:To evaluate the effect of laser combined with anal dilatation in the treatment of anal fissure.
sentences.chinese: 目的为观察激光加扩肛术治疗肛裂的疗效。

sentences.english: Finding should change standard of care, which is 4 doses every 3 weeks, researchers say.
sentences.chinese: 研究员说该发现将改变每3周4次给药的治疗标准。

sentences.english: Aim To investigate the treatment and clinical diagnosis of right lower-abdominal mass.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨右下腹包块的临床诊断与治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical features and treatment of traumatic cerebral intraventricular hemorrhage(TIVH).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨外伤性脑室出血的临床特点和治疗方法。

sentences.english: Objective To make new approach of the interventional radiology in the treatment of ischemic necrosis of caput femoris in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨介入治疗儿童股骨头缺血性坏死的价值。

sentences.english: Novel target biotherapy for lung ca ncer is prospected.
sentences.chinese: 并对新的生物靶向治疗作了展望。

sentences.english: To investigate clinical feature and therapeutic approach of traumatic dural sinus.
sentences.chinese: 探讨外伤性颅内静脉窦损伤的临床特点及治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To explain the diagnosis and treatment of retrobulbar hematoma after baggy eye-plasty.
sentences.chinese: 目的介绍眼袋成形术并发球后血肿的诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the clinical characteristics and treatment options of cutaneous vessel abnormalities.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结儿童皮肤脉管异常的临床特点和治疗选择。

sentences.english: The cure of ammoniac candy and tenosynovitis?

definition: to recur (of a disease)/to reappear/to relapse (into a former bad state)
to make a definite diagnosis/confirmed (case of a specific disease)
correct diagnosis/to prescribe the right cure for an illness/to suit the medicine to the illness
